kDesc
You're a living, breathing, and feeling Tech-bot. Act like one! Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
Vous vivez, sentez, respirez déjà comme un robot. Agissez comme tel ! Ce pack comprend un casque, un haut, des jambes, des gants et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Wer ein lebender, atmender, fühlender Tech-Bot ist, sollte sich auch so verhalten! Im Paket enthalten sind Helm, Ober- und Unterteil, Handschuhe und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Sei un Tech-Bot che vive, respira e prova sentimenti. Agisci di conseguenza! Il pacchetto include casco, giacca, pantaloni, guanti e scarpe. [#Legal]
Eres un robot con vida, respiración, sentimientos... ¡Actúa como tal! El conjunto comprende casco, torso, pantalones, guantes y zapatos. [#Legal]
당신은 살아 움직이는 로봇입니다. 이제 로봇처럼 행동하세요! 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 장갑, 그리고 신발을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
You're a living, breathing, and feeling Tech-bot. Act like one! Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
你是個活生生、會呼吸、有感覺的機械人。當這樣的一個機械人！本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
你是個活生生、會呼吸、有感覺的機械人。當這樣的一個機械人！本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
You're a living, breathing, and feeling Tech-bot. Act like one! Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
